mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.name, b.belong, b.title, b.keywords, b.description, b.alt, a.filename AS fileName, a.filesize AS fileSize, a.filetype AS fileType, a.filepath AS filePath, a.file_id AS fileId FROM module b LEFT JOIN system_attachment a ON b.attachment_id=a.id WHERE b.belong=#{belong} ORDER BY b.sort
